description: An eventNotification trap indicates that an application
integrated with Shogun has generated an Event that requires the
attention of the system administrator.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ENDACE-EDA-MIB::eventNotification ENDACE-EDA-MIB::agentId s EXAMPLE ENDACE-EDA-MIB::eventId s EXAMPLE ENDACE-EDA-MIB::eventDescr s EXAMPLE

description: Unique ID of the Agent that generated the event
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::agentId

description: Unique ID of the Event that the Agent generated.
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::eventId

description: Textual description of the Event that the Agent generated.
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::eventDescr

description: An alarmRaisedNotification trap indicates that an alarm that
requires the attention of the system administrator was
raised.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmRaisedNotification ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmCriteria u 9999 ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmDescr s EXAMPLE ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmName s EXAMPLE ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmSeverity u 9999 ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmTrigger C 9999 ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmType u 9999

description: The criteria that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmCriteria

description: Description of the Rule that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmDescr

description: Unique Name of the Rule that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmName

description: The severity of the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmSeverity

description: The trigger that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmTrigger

description: The type of the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmType

description: An alarmClearedNotification trap indicates that an alarm that
was raised previously was cleared.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmClearedNotification ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmCriteria u 9999 ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmDescr s EXAMPLE ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmName s EXAMPLE ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmSeverity u 9999 ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmTrigger C 9999 ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmType u 9999

description: The criteria that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmCriteria

description: Description of the Rule that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmDescr

description: Unique Name of the Rule that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmName

description: The severity of the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmSeverity

description: The trigger that generated the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmTrigger

description: The type of the alarm
variables.name: ENDACE-EDA-MIB::alarmType
